simpleForm.description: A top area containing the screen's title or heading.

style.description: CSS style string or class reference for the header.

attributes.name: titleText
attributes.description: The text displayed in the header.

attributes.name: alignment
attributes.description: Specifies how the header text is aligned (e.g., 'center', 'left').

output.description: This component does not produce output data.

simpleForm.description: A single-line text field for entering information.

style.description: CSS style string or class reference for the text input.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Placeholder text for the input field.

attributes.name: maxLength
attributes.description: Maximum number of characters allowed.

validations.description: Field must be filled if mandatory.

simpleForm.description: A component to select a date (e.g. birthday).

style.description: CSS style string or class reference for the date input.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label text describing the date field.

attributes.name: minDate
attributes.description: Earliest allowable date (e.g., '1900-01-01' in ISO format).

attributes.name: maxDate
attributes.description: Latest allowable date (e.g., '2100-12-31' in ISO format).

output.description: The selected date in a standardized format (e.g., ISO).

validations.description: Date must be provided if mandatory.
Must be a valid calendar date within allowed range.

simpleForm.description: A component for recording and uploading voice notes.

style.description: CSS style string or class reference for the voice note component.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label text describing the voice note field.

attributes.name: maxDuration
attributes.description: Maximum recording duration in seconds.

attributes.name: allowPlayback
attributes.description: Whether to allow playback of the recorded voice note.

attributes.name: allowRetry
attributes.description: Whether to allow re-recording the voice note.

output.description: URL or base64 encoded string of the recorded voice note.

validations.description: Voice note must be provided if mandatory.
Recording cannot exceed the specified duration.
Voice note must be in a supported format (e.g., MP3, WAV).

advancedForm.description: A track bar for selecting a numeric value, accompanied by a label.

style.description: CSS style string or class reference for the slider component.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Descriptive text displayed alongside the slider.

attributes.name: minValue
attributes.description: The slider's minimum allowed value.

attributes.name: maxValue
attributes.description: The slider's maximum allowed value.

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Increment steps for the slider.

attributes.name: defaultValue
attributes.description: The initial slider position.

output.description: The numeric value the user has selected.

validations.description: A value must be selected if the field is mandatory.
Selected value must be within minValue and maxValue.
Value must align with the defined step increments.

advancedForm.description: An input for phone numbers, including country-code selection and verification.

style.description: CSS style string or class reference for the phone input.

attributes.name: countryCodes
attributes.description: List of supported country codes, each with { id: string, label: string, code: string }.

attributes.name: defaultCountryCode
attributes.description: ID of the pre-selected country code.

attributes.name: verificationMethod
attributes.description: Preferred method for verification (e.g., 'sms', 'whatsapp').

output.description: The full phone number (country code + local number).

validations.description: Phone number must be provided if mandatory.
Must be a valid phone format (e.g., E.164).
